title: Introduction to Paul's Epistle to the Romans, Living Stones Adult Sunday School Preview
description:
Living Stones Adult Sunday School is restarting. I don't normally post my church videos on this channel but this will give you a sneak peak into what is coming if you're unaware of it. The link to the church channel is here. https://www.youtube.com/c/LivingStonesChristianReformedSacramento

The Sunday School audio will be hosted weekly on the regular audio only podcast version of this channel. 

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

Also on Odysee: https://odysee.com/@paulvanderklay

Paul's Church Content at Living Stones Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh7bdktIALZ9Nq41oVCvW-A

To support Paul's work by supporting his church give here. https://tithe.ly/give?c=2160640
